plot: Luke and Johnny are best friends. Luke has a terminal illness and spends his last moments with Johnny at home. Luke wants to go to the beach with Johnny but can only be taken to the beach in his memories.
title: Wish List
plot_es: Luke and Johnny are best friends. Luke has a terminal illness and spends his last moments with Johnny at home. Luke wants to go to the beach with Johnny but can only be taken to the beach in his memories.
plot_en: Luke and Johnny are best friends. Luke has a terminal illness and spends his last moments with Johnny at home. Luke wants to go to the beach with Johnny but can only be taken to the beach in his memories.
